name: Life-CoachingwithRockyai
0:
”Alexa, open life coaching.”
”Alexa, start life coaching.”
”Alexa, launch life coaching.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life coaching
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Think through reflective situations, using the proven solution-focused guided coaching frameworks, positive psychology and cognitive behavior to recognize negative or unhelpful thought and behavior patterns but also cherish your victories.

You are one step away to begin your positive growth path and better up your best self with your ai-powered life coach.

Rocky is an ai coach, chatbot and mindset coach, always at your service, to boost your entrepreneurial and leadership skills, with just daily regular 5-minute growth-mind sessions.

You can learn more about the app at:
- Website https://www.rocky.ai
- Playstore https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ai.rocky.app&hl=de&gl=US
- Appstore https://apps.apple.com/us/app/rocky-mindset-and-life-coach/id1492680249

Who can Rocky.ai help?
AI powered Rocky is for: entrepreneurs, business owners, mid-size managers, as well as high-performing talents, students and motivated people who want to accelerate and improve their career and life to reach their goal and become true leaders.

For your self-improvement and positive mindset coach, as AI powered Coaching App will give you a reflective and guided daily journal to:

As a true sparring partner and life-coach, this mindset app takes care of improving your skills to let you be a world-class performer, with the following tools:

🟦 Guided journaling & self-reflection
Rocky listens and interjects life-coaching questions to guide you in achieving your best self.
You will optimize your time by focusing on the proper self-improvement notions and receiving affirmations and empathy for success.

ROCKY HELPS AS GUIDED GOALSETTER:
🟣 Track your progress and enhance your commitment
🟣 Create your follow-ups and accountability
🟣 Set reminders based on your growth day

Collect points and climb up the leaderboard with other like-minded people and unlock the levels to reach the top of each soft-skill area.

✔️ Own your day with mindfulness and life coaching
✔️ Be focused and understand what is important and urgent
✔️ Take control over your direction in life mindfully
✔️ Develop supporting high-performance goal, habits and routine
✔️ Boost your productivity and get things done
✔️ Achieve and work towards your most important goal
✔️ Build your career and work towards your promotion
✔️ Master self-reflection and become mindful about your behavior
✔️ Gain clarity, get confident, learn and feel empathy
✔️ Create a happier well-being and positive lifestyle

Work on your goal, skills & habits!

Betterup empathy with a reflective mindset coach
Your Mindset App to compete in a fast-changing world, pursue your dreams.

Find the right goalsetter.
Life-Coaching to get reflective to create passion needed to achieve a better me.

Now you don't need to be an executive manager to get a business coach. Guided self-coaching for your success coaching in career and life. This better me and mindset app is the new form of developing positive mindset, primed mind, and life-coaching with self-reflection.

Start now for free!
